actions.text: Amendment SA 3176 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 67. Record Vote Number: 77.
Amendment SA 3176 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 2944. (consideration: CR S2440, S2441-2454, S2458-2459) To establish the Senate Office of Public Integrity.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3176 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 67. Record Vote Number: 77.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3176 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 67. Record Vote Number: 77.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3176 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 2944.

amends_amendment.purpose: To establish as a standing order of the Senate a requirement that a Senator publicly disclose a notice of intent to object to proceeding to any measure or matter.

purpose: To establish the Senate Office of Public Integrity.
